entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the evening then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
